archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Potentialkortet
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: Potentialkortet is a sales analysis and planning tool for the Swedish Retail Bank specifically for Client Executives and their Branchoffice Managers. Potentialkortet is based on a statistical model which compares SEB's current earnings with the potential earnings on customers and suggests sales strategies and support for prioritization of sales work. Potentialkortet is a pure web frontend and requires the CRM Mart backend to function - it only reads information from the CRM Mart.
